alert.note: Alert for Ventura (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 21 at 1:56AM PST until December 21 at 2:30AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: The National Weather Service in OXNARD has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Ventura County in southwestern California... * Until 230 AM PST. * At 154 AM PST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near El Rio and Saticoy and moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This tornadic thunderstorm will remain over Saticoy and west of Santa Paula. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in OXNARD. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
